CloudWatchAlarmTemplateComparisonOperato.description: The comparison operator used to compare the specified statistic and the threshold.
CloudWatchAlarmTemplateComparisonOperato.markdownDescription:
The comparison operator used to compare the specified statistic and the threshold.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: GreaterThanOrEqualToThreshold | GreaterThanThreshold | LessThanThreshold | LessThanOrEqualToThreshold  
Update requires: No interruption

CloudWatchAlarmTemplateStatistic.description: The statistic to apply to the alarm's metric data.
CloudWatchAlarmTemplateStatistic.markdownDescription:
The statistic to apply to the alarm's metric data.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SampleCount | Average | Sum | Minimum | Maximum  
Update requires: No interruption

CloudWatchAlarmTemplateTargetResourceTyp.description: The resource type this template should dynamically generate cloudwatch metric alarms for.
CloudWatchAlarmTemplateTargetResourceTyp.markdownDescription:
The resource type this template should dynamically generate cloudwatch metric alarms for.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION | MEDIALIVE_MULTIPLEX | MEDIALIVE_CHANNEL | MEDIALIVE_INPUT_DEVICE | MEDIAPACKAGE_CHANNEL | MEDIAPACKAGE_ORIGIN_ENDPOINT | MEDIACONNECT_FLOW | S3_BUCKET  
Update requires: No interruption

CloudWatchAlarmTemplateTreatMissingData.description: Specifies how missing data points are treated when evaluating the alarm's condition.
CloudWatchAlarmTemplateTreatMissingData.markdownDescription:
Specifies how missing data points are treated when evaluating the alarm's condition.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: notBreaching | breaching | ignore | missing  
Update requires: No interruption

GroupId.description: A cloudwatch alarm template group's id. AWS provided template groups have ids that start with `aws-`
GroupId.markdownDescription:
A cloudwatch alarm template group's id. AWS provided template groups have ids that start with `aws-`

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 7  
Maximum Length: 11  
Pattern: ^(aws-)?[0-9]{7}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
